name: Wombsti and Bombsti
description:
Wombsti and Bombsti is a fun little game where you need to get to the finish zone as fast as you can to extinguish Bombsti's fuse before it burns down and triggers Bombsti's explosion.

Navigate through the levels by shooting Wombsti across the stage using your left mouse button or W. Wombsti is a burdock, so it sticks to (most) walls. To release Wombsti from the walls press the right mouse button or Q. But watch out! Dangerous flames and flamethrowers will make Bombsti explode if you're not careful enough!

Can you help Wombsti and Bombsti with their never-ending struggle to keep Bombsti alive?

Wombsti and Bombsti was created during Game Jam Linz 2021

*if you think something is a bug....it's a feature ;)
